Utilities¶

A package that contains common utility functions for the entire project.

This module provides functions to access JSON files.

class utils.file_access.FileAccess¶

FileAccess class provides methods to read JSON config files.

static get_db_config()¶

Gets configuration of the cloud database.

A wrapper method to read database configurations.

Returns

a dictionary representation of the database configurations.

Return type

dict

static get_ip_config()¶

Gets IP address of the server.

A wrapper method to read IP address of the server.

Returns

a dictionary representation of the database configurations.

Return type

dict

static json_to_dict(path)¶

Reads JSON file and converts it to a Python dictionary.

Parameters

path – the path of the JSON file.

Returns

a dictionary representation of the JSON file if read in correctly, None otherwise

Return type

dict

This module provides functions to help with console UI menus.

class utils.menu_helper.MenuHelper¶

MenuHelper class provides common methods to help with building menus.

static ask_for_input(menu_end_number)¶

Asks user for menu choices.

It asks, validates and returns the user entered choices.

Parameters

menu_end_number – The choice number that corresponds to the last menu item.

Returns

the choice the user enters.

Return type

int

static print_menu(menu_items)¶

Creates a menu with given items.

Parameters

menu_items – a list items to be used as menu items.

Returns

no return value as it prints menu to the stdout.

Return type

None

This module contains the validator class that’s used to validate user inputs.

class utils.validator.Validator¶

The Validator class contains static methods to validate various user inputs.

static validate_fullname(string)¶

Validates user input of the full name of the user.

It compares the user input string with the preset regular expression that represents the correct format of the full name - first name and last name with one space in between, only letters are allowed.

Parameters

string – user input of the full name.

Returns

True if the user input matches the regular expression, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

static validate_password(string)¶

Validate user input of the password.

It compares the user input string with the preset regular expression that represents the correct format of the password - minimum of 6 alphanumeric characters, with at least one letter and one number.

Parameters

string – user input of the password.

Returns

True if the user input matches the regular expression, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

static validate_username(string)¶

Validates user input of the username.

It compares the user input string with the preset regular expression that represents the correct format of the username - minimum of 4 alphanumeric characters.

Parameters

string – user input of the username.

Returns

True if the user input matches the regular expression, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

This module has the Encryptor class to provide hash and salt functions to passwords.

class utils.encryptor.Encryptor¶

The Encryptor class provides static functions to encrypt and verify passwords.

The code is adapted from https://www.vitoshacademy.com/hashing-passwords-in-python/

static encrypt(password)¶

Encrypt a plain password string using hash and salt.

It creates a random salt using SHA-256 method and then creates a hash of the plain password plus the salt.

Parameters

password – the plain string of the password.

Returns

A string of hash value of the password with the salt prefixed.

Return type

str

static verify(password_plain, password_hash_and_salt)¶

Verifies if the plain password matches the hashed password.

It first extracts the salt from the hashed password and then uses the same method to generate a hash with the salt and the plain password. Lastly it compares the newly generated hash with hashed password.

Parameters

  • password_plain – a plain password string to be verified.

  • password_hash_and_salt – the saved hash value of the correct password.

Returns

True if the plain password matches the saved password, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

This module provides functionality to interact with the Google Calendar API.

class utils.calendar_access.CalendarAccess¶

CalendarAccess class provides methods to access Google Calendar API.

add_due_date_event(title, desc, due_date)¶

Creates a calendar event on the due date of the book.

It creates an event on the Google Calendar to remind users of returning the borrowed book.

Parameters

  • title – the title of the calendar event.

  • desc – the description of the calendar event.

  • due_date – the date of the calendar event.

Returns

the event id of the newly created event.

Return type

str

delete_event(event_id)¶

Delete the given event from Google Calendar.

Parameters

event_id – the id of the event to delete.

Returns

no return value.

Return type

None

This module provides functionality to allow transcribing voice to text.

class utils.voice_to_text.VoiceToText¶

VoiceToText class provides methods to record audio and transcribe the audio to text using Google Speech-to-Text API.

MIC_NAME¶

the default microphone of the Master Pi.

Type

str

__device_id¶

the index number of the default microphone.

Type

int

__recognizer¶

a speech recognizer instance.

Type

speech.Recognizer

__audio¶

the recorded audio.

Type

AudioData

record_audio()¶

Record audio using the default microphone

It prompts the user to speak and then records and saves the audio.

Returns

None

transcribe()¶

Transcribe the saved audio to text using Google Speech-to-Text API

It takes the previously saved audio and transcribes it to text.

Returns

the transcribed text. None: when there is an error.

Return type

str

This module provides functionality to scan QR codes

class utils.qr_code_scanner.QrCodeScanner¶

QrCodeScanner class handles video camera to scan, decode, and save QR codes

__video¶

the video stream service.

Type

VideoStream

__found¶

a set of scanned QR code data.

Type

set

scan()¶

Scans, decodes, and saves QR code data using the camera

It will continue scanning QR code until no more QR code is found.

Returns

a list of QR code data expressed as string.

Return type

list
